noun.description: A kind of ragtime dance in which the whole body shakes or sways.
Shaking, especially abnormal vibration of the wheels of a motor vehicle.
examples: steering stabilizers reduce shimmy even from oversized tires

verb.description: Move effortlessly; glide with a swaying motion.
examples: her hair swung in waves as she shimmied down the catwalk
he braked hard and felt the car shimmy dangerously
